content:
Last month, Emma was the top scorer in her local underwater basket-weaving tournament; she made $2$ baskets every $4$ minutes. On the graph below, the $x$-axis represents time (in minutes) and the $y$-axis represents baskets completed.

**Plot points to show how many baskets Emma created after $2$, $4$, and $8$ minutes**.
